400.title: 400 - Bad Request
400.message: We are sorry, but there is something wrong in your request. The URL may be misspelled.

401.title: 401 - Unauthorized
401.message: We are sorry, but your request is unauthorized.

403.title: 403 - Forbidden
403.message: We are sorry, but your request is forbidden.

404.title: 404 - Not Found
404.message: We are sorry, the page you requested cannot be found. The URL may be misspelled or the page you’re looking for is no longer available.

500.title: 500 - Generic Error
500.message: We are sorry, there has been an unknown error.

1000.title: 1000 - Disable private mode or upgrade your browser
1000.message: This web site requires recent browser features including (but not limited to) audio and video, blobs, canvas, css transforms, file api, local and session storage, scalable vector graphics and web workers.

1001.title: 401 - Unauthorized
1001.message: Sorry, the provider did not authenticate you.

invalidFileId.title: 404 - Not Found
invalidFileId.message: Invalid file id: use a name of 3 to 50 and an extension of 2 to 7 alphanumeric characters

invalidLanguage.title: 404 - Not Found
invalidLanguage.message: Invalid language: this language is not implemented.

invalidMonth.title: 404 - Not Found
invalidMonth.message: Invalid month: use a two-digit number between 01 and 12

invalidObjectId.title: 404 - Not Found
invalidObjectId.message: Invalid object identifier: an identifier is an hexadecimal string of 24 characters.

invalidYear.title: 404 - Not Found
invalidYear.message: Invalid year: use a four-digit number between 2014 and the current year
